response.overview: Did 2Pac sell his soul to the devil? This DVD documentary shows Tupac Shakur breaking the Illuminati Oath…did the Illuminati kill 2Pac, or was it the west/east coast war?…this DVD goes into the background of Tupac, Black Panthers, signing to Interscope Rec, his jailings, the 1st shooting & who set that up, as well as signing to Death Row Records
response.title: Tupac - Breaking The Oath
